mapper.sql: id, code, name, official_code, be_disable, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, auditor_by, auditor_time, apply_type, apply_status, apply_code, company_code, company_name, be_effective, selection_effective_time, selection_effective_start_time, direct_supervisor_code, direct_supervisor_name, form_no
mapper.select: select a.apply_code aapply_code, a.name aname, a.be_disable abe_disable, a.create_by acreate_by, a.create_time acreate_time, a.auditor_by aauditor_by, a.auditor_time aauditor_time, a.apply_type aapply_type, a.apply_status aapply_status, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.form_no aform_no, b.sku_code bsku_code, b.sku_name bsku_name, b.be_disable bbe_disable, b.categories_supply_channels_code bcategories_supply_channels_code, b.categories_supply_channels_name bcategories_supply_channels_name, b.direct_delivery_supplier_code bdirect_delivery_supplier_code, b.direct_delivery_supplier_name,b.direct_delivery_supplier_name, c.code ccode, c.name cname, c.status cstatus, c.type ctype from apply_product_sku_sale_area_main a left join apply_product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join apply_product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code where a.apply_code = #{code}

select a.id aid, a.code acode, a.name aname, a.official_code aofficial_code, a.be_disable abe_disable, a.create_by acreate_by, a.create_time acreate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.auditor_by aauditor_by, a.auditor_time aauditor_time, a.apply_type aapply_type, a.apply_status aapply_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.company_code acompany_code, a.company_name acompany_name, a.be_effective abe_effective, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.direct_supervisor_code adirect_supervisor_code, a.direct_supervisor_name adirect_supervisor_name, a.form_no aform_no, b.id bid, b.code bcode, b.sku_code bsku_code, b.sku_name bsku_name, b.be_disable bbe_disable, b.categories_supply_channels_code bcategories_supply_channels_code, b.categories_supply_channels_name bcategories_supply_channels_name, b.direct_delivery_supplier_code bdirect_delivery_supplier_code, b.direct_delivery_supplier_name bdirect_delivery_supplier_name, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.company_code bcompany_code, b.company_name, b.company_name, c.id cid, c.main_code cmain_code, c.sku_code csku_code, c.type ctype, c.status cstatus, c.name cname, c.code ccode, c.company_code ccompany_code, c.company_name ccompany_name, c.province_id cprovince_id, d.id did, d.code dcode, d.price_channel_code dprice_channel_code, d.price_channel_name dprice_channel_name, d.company_code dcompany_code, d.company_name dcompany_name from apply_product_sku_sale_area_main a left join apply_product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join apply_product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code left join apply_product_sku_sale_area_channel d on a.code = d.code where a.form_no = #{formNo}

select a.id aid, a.code acode, a.name aname, a.official_code aofficial_code, a.be_disable abe_disable, a.create_by acreate_by, a.create_time acreate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.auditor_by aauditor_by, a.auditor_time aauditor_time, a.apply_type aapply_type, a.apply_status aapply_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.company_code acompany_code, a.company_name acompany_name, a.be_effective abe_effective, a.selection_effective_time aselection_effective_time, a.selection_effective_start_time aselection_effective_start_time, a.direct_supervisor_code adirect_supervisor_code, a.direct_supervisor_name adirect_supervisor_name, a.form_no aform_no, b.id bid, b.code bcode, b.sku_code bsku_code, b.sku_name bsku_name, b.be_disable bbe_disable, b.categories_supply_channels_code bcategories_supply_channels_code, b.categories_supply_channels_name bcategories_supply_channels_name, b.direct_delivery_supplier_code bdirect_delivery_supplier_code, b.direct_delivery_supplier_name bdirect_delivery_supplier_name, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.company_code bcompany_code, b.company_name, b.company_name, c.id cid, c.main_code cmain_code, c.sku_code csku_code, c.type ctype, c.status cstatus, c.name cname, c.code ccode, c.company_code ccompany_code, c.company_name ccompany_name, c.province_id cprovince_id, d.id did, d.code dcode, d.price_channel_code dprice_channel_code, d.price_channel_name dprice_channel_name, d.company_code dcompany_code, d.company_name dcompany_name from apply_product_sku_sale_area_main a left join apply_product_sku_sale_area b on a.code = b.code left join apply_product_sku_sale_area_info c on a.code = c.main_code left join apply_product_sku_sale_area_channel d on a.code = d.code where a.be_effective = 0 and a.selection_effective_start_time <= now()

select
from apply_product_sku_sale_area_main where name = #{name} and apply_status in (0,1)
